website_summaries.verdict: Gets high marks across the board for its size, construction, and seat coverage.
pros: PVC leather construction, with anti-slip dots to prevent slipping
Has reinforced stitching and is padded for comfort
Good high coverage on the seat
cons: A few complaints of the stitching starting to tear after a few months
Some buyers felt the anti-slip dots didn't live up to their claim, and that this protector slides around the seat too much

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst seat cover ever. It attaches around neck rest and comes lose and slides down, constantly tightening strap. It slides all over the seat. I have a small car and it does not cover seat well, big gap on both sides. It has netting down the center and the 2 sides keep overlapping each other which makes it lumpy. Honestly the worst.
customer_reviews.author: C. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Update: great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Update 9/29/18 The company sent me a new car seat protector at no charge! They stand by the quality of their products. I am impressed! Previous review: This thing smells so strongly of chemicals I had to leave it outside for a few days before I could even take a closer look at it. Even the box smelled awful. The toxic gas it produces can not be good have in a hot car. Once it breathed outside for a few days I took a look. It has tons of stitching holes in it. No way this will be 100% water proof. I’m returning it and buying one like we already have for my other kids.
customer_reviews.author: LifeLibertyHappiness

customer_reviews.title: Stained my seat!!!
customer_reviews.text: . My car has beige seats and with a kid it's great to have something to protect the seat from spills. That's until I took it off and theres a stain on my seats from this protector! Totally ruined my seats
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Car seat slips around
customer_reviews.text: Had a bad experience with my car seat installation. Looks great, BUT....as a parent, when installing a car seat I know that it is secure when the car seat does not move around more than an inch in either direction. When installing my Graco 4Ever car seat on top of this seat protector, the car seat easily slips around, leaving me concerned. I'll be looking for another seat protector that makes me feel like my child is more safely secured.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted to go under the toddler car seat on my 2018 Atlas. The carseat dug into my leatherette seats within one week. This protector is firm enough to prevent more damage and doesn’t cause the baby carseat to move around. There’s a gap you can see in the picture where the buckle and anchors go through. At first I thought the gap was silly because I’d prefer it catch dirt and crumbs but if it was made that way then the seatbelts and anchors wouldn’t fit properly. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J2MRIG

customer_reviews.title: Car seats slide too much on these.
customer_reviews.text: The padding is nice, but the top surface is far too slippery to properly secure the car seats. I have the premium Britax ClickTight car seats that firmly secure second to none, and even with those I could not get them tight enough to prevent sliding on these seat protectors. It's a great concept, but in the end I returned this because I'd rather protect my children than the seat upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: Susquehannock

customer_reviews.title: More than a Back Seat Protector!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Personal Trainer and an 5/6x week gym user. I chose the Lusso Gear pad as Driver's seat protector for the post gym rides home. Been back and forth for over a week now. Not only is the pad inordinately comfortable and supportive, it does not seem to retain any of the "remnants" - read sweat and smell, of my two hour workouts and sessions with my clients. I'd offer that they have a different niche to add to their marketing plan. The product is everything I hoped for. BTW - Lusso Gear's email engagement, while a staple of Amazon vendors, is unparalleled. You actually get the sense that someone is reading the response mails and is actually concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D.

customer_reviews.title: Not as big or thick as some cheaper versions
customer_reviews.text: So i ordered two of these for $25 each and 2 cheaper but still thick pads ($29 for the set) so that i could cover 4 seats total. I planned to place these more expensive and supposedly thicker mats under my two "larger" car seats and the smaller ones under the booster seats, but after receiving them, i swapped and put the cheaper, larger more padded ones under the baby seat and larger car seat and these are now going in the back with the booster seats... The cheaper (2 for 29) were around 1/2" wider in coverage. In the pictures you will see these mats BARELY cover the seat where the larger car seat sits.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Nelson

customer_reviews.title: The smell alone! Returning it out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the amazon box I started to smell it, but then once I removed the seat cover from it's actual box, boy! It was terrible. Toxic, chemical, plasticy smell. At first I thought it just needed to "air out" and then I realized that I am not putting something this pungent near my kids carseat. Super bummed because the quality is better than the other brand I ordered to try. It is made well and would likely have worked well. But for the smell!
customer_reviews.author: Larrabee Family

customer_reviews.title: Nope, try another
customer_reviews.text: I trusted this to protect my brand new 2018 grand Cherokee, and after a week of having it in my car, my baby’s car seat still left an idention. Pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but...
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! Better than the summer infant car seat protector which I had on my older child’s car seat. It’s sturdy, it looks and feels fantastic, it doesn’t look cheap. My only draw back is that it feels like leather which makes the car seat slippery even with the attached tether on its back.I wish it was a little rubbery, so now, I may need to put something under my child’s rear facing car seat to keep it from slipping
customer_reviews.author: Maricris

customer_reviews.title: Stains leather
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great but a big issue I just realized after using it for 7 months is that it stains the leather from the white backing it has. Tried some leather cleaning product and it doesn't really come off
customer_reviews.author: israel

customer_reviews.title: A padding that will protect your leather seats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in November and was waiting to write review based on how much protection it would actually provide to leather seats. Upon installing this padding in November, I used the car seat alleast 3 days a week for averaging about 2 hours every use. 5 months later with almost continuous use of car seat I moved the car seat base and checked if the padding works. And amazingly the car seat base left no marks on the leather. There were few impressions but they got even out within few minutes of moving this seat. I strongly recommend this to protect your leather seats. I haven't washed it yet so can't comment on sustainability of the material after washing.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: No more messy footprints on my seats
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty thick, which is great. Has good coverage of the seat. I thought I'd get really great use out of the pockets underneath the seat, but honestly I haven't used them. My carseat is rear facing still, so that may change as the kiddo gets older. I was pretty impressed with how well it collapses if you ever need to store it. The slots for the anchors are large, so it's versatile for a lot of car seats. I still have my doubts about whether it will protect my actual seats from indentation, but I'll check in a couple weeks and return back with an update.
customer_reviews.author: dpat33

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made Bad Design
customer_reviews.text: Felt thin and cheap, we will see how much it actually keeps a car seat from ruining leather seats. It’s definitely too small, the back doesn’t even reach the top of the seat so the child seat I have in place will definitely continue to ruin the top of my seats. I don’t understand all the rave reviews, I’ve had one of these before I lost it and it was twice as thick, twice as heavy, and large enough for a child’s seat to sit on. I wasted $25 considering it is only doing half the job. That’s online shopping for you...
customer_reviews.author: TheIndubitablyTiredMadness

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the best quality seat protector i have come across. Nice and thick. Well made. Seems like it will last for many years. When i was about to take it to my SUV, i realized it does not have the strap to wrap around the headrest. I thought that was going to be a setback, but surprisingly it doesn't need one. Thankfully, cause my middle seat doesnt have a headrest. The seat protector stays in place. An added bonus is that due to it being wide (for a perfect fit) the seatbelt keeps it in place (when unbuckled up againt the seat.)
customer_reviews.author: Lissette B. B.

customer_reviews.title: Approved
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed this yet. But we got it for our Tesla. Really hope it fits with the style of head rest. But out of package... The material looks good. Well made. Looks like the coverage of the cover is sufficient. Overall.... Great. UPDATE: just installed this morning. It's a perfect fit and totally blends in nicely with my black leather. Looks great. I have attached a couple pics.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie Kopp

customer_reviews.title: Great product with exceptional customer service
customer_reviews.text: Updated: was immediately contacted by the company upon my review and they vowed to make it right. Super nice owners and explained they had a bad lot. Replaced the car seat protectors and they are great quality and function. Would definitely recommend! Original: Purchased 2 for our new van and both protectors smell SO BAD. Almost like a chemical/mold smell. I have aired out them both indoors and outdoors and it’s been almost a week and they have yet to lose the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Probably could have been a 5
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those items that shouldn't be reviewed until used for a while. I cannot say anything about how it wears because I had to return it due the fact that when my daughter tried it out, she found the storage pockets to be irritating to the backs of her legs. Other than that, it seemed great. It installed easily and seemed secure in the back seat captains chair of my Subaru Ascent. If only they would have skipped the mesh pockets and opted for smooth fabric I would have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lumb

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase! Buying another
customer_reviews.text: We have a Graco Nautilus and this is big enough to protect our seat from the entire carseat. A different seat protector we tried first was not big enough. This protects also all the way up the back entirely. I had it on for about 2-3 months and needed to move the seat, checked my leather seat beneath and behind where it was installed and my leather seats looked in perfect condition, no indents or bumps from the protector and no sticking. We live in FL and the heat is insanely hot along with high humidity so I don't know of a better place to test out the quality and endurance of this protector! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We finally got around to putting 2 of these seat protectors in both cars yesterday and I have to say I love them. We tried the Munchkin one that is an Amazon best seller, and this Lusso one blows it out of the water! They are very well designed and fit both manufacturers perfectly (Hyundai and Ford). They form perfectly to the top and bottom seat proportions and I love how long the slits are cut out for the seat belt and child car seat quick connect hooks. I'm really excited to see how they hold up against our messy son and all the crumbs he leaves behind. Thank you Lusso for finally making a great car seat protector!
customer_reviews.author: itsZACyo

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea and LOVE the Clean Look
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and great idea. I've had multiple carseats over the years for multiple grandkids, and every time it was such a pain to try to protect my expensive leather seats. Not sure why it took me so long to look for an option to the bath towels I usually used. So glad I found this. It makes my car look so much better (without all those towels) and is easy to install (not really the right word since you literally just hook it over the seat). My only complaint after having just bought 3, is that it is definitely overpriced. There's no reason for this to be more than $15. Other than that, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Having just bought a new VW Jetta GLI Turbo Autobahn -- and because I am a runner who often gets in the car very sweaty -- I ordered this seat cover. It just arrived, and took about 5 seconds to install. You simply place it on the seat, tighten the adjustable belt over the headrest, and tuck in the seat joint. The material appears to be extremely durable. It's also very attractive. Black, with red accents (a color scheme that mirrors the GLI interior). The entire seat is now protected, and at least in my case the cover is difficult to distinguish from factory equipment. Really nicely engineered piece of craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hays

customer_reviews.title: keep your car nice
customer_reviews.text: So you have kids, but you're a car guy and don't have the luxury of a daily driver. slap one of these bad bois down under the car seat, and marvel at the seats not getting damaged, stretched out, punctured, etc. The rest of your car? good luck. kids are hilariously hard on a vehicle. Are you a car guy (or girl) and don't have kids? you will have friends who will have kids. gift this to them. These seat protectors are sturdy, thicc, and very durable. they don't leave any stains on your seats either.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase another one
customer_reviews.text: Picked this seat cover (above all the others) because of its great reviews. But I’m not very impressed. It shifts & doesn’t stay in place. There is not enough Velcro at the top attachment, if that makes sense, so it isn’t a tight fit to begin with. It droops & sags. But it is keeping the car seat off the leather seat so I guess it’s doing something right. But I would not recommend this cover. And I will not purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: BritishHistoryNut

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, stays in place, unbeatable quality! I didn't get these for baby car seats; I needed something that is well made, stayed on the front seats without sliding, looks good and cleans easily and these are them! I was so impressed by the quality, I ordered a document holder. Hubby was impressed as well and will get the front seat organizer. The coupon book and airfreshners is a nice touch too! I'm really glad I trusted the 1,000+ positive ratings!
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying two because of how well they work! I noticed the car seat was already cutting the leather so I found this seat protector and it’s got enough thickness to do the job while making it much easier to clean! Crumbs have a weird way of finding it under the car seat but this protector also saves from having that directly on the seat! Also a plus it ships IMMEDIATELY.. like I ordered it in the evening and got it the next day. The company sent me a personal email to make sure I received my order. I HIGHLY recommend buying from this company! Worth every penny and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to protect car seat and back.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first attempt to find a way to find comfort for my pain. Apparently, I was too ignorant to know what to search for. This is strictly for protection of the car seat, not to relieve discomfort. If you're looking strictly for car sear protection, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Zuehl

customer_reviews.title: Head Rest Strap Disintegrates
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for about six months now and one morning I noticed the strap was no longer connected to the seats head rest. Further investigating the strap I noticed that it literally started to disintegrate. I feel that this product lacks UV protection, and the strap fell apart due to this. The strap material is known as webbing, and I suspect that it is either made or Nylon or poly propylene which is not a great material against the UV ray sunlight. I hope someone reaches out from Lusso about this defective webbing on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Car saver!
customer_reviews.text: Any toddler can be messy but so can dogs too. I have two of these in my car. One where my sons car seat is and another where my dogs sits in the back. They protect my leather car seats wonderfully and look nice. A big plus is just how easy they are to put into your car; there was no trouble! Another big plus is because the car seat protector is so thick and soft my dog easily falls asleep on it and we have no trouble with long road trips. Highly recommend you get this, weather you have a baby or animals or both like me :)
customer_reviews.author: B.New

customer_reviews.title: Causes carseat to slip and slipe
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this protector but do not! Pros:The material seems thick and durable Cons: This product could not be safety used with our chicco myfit harness booster. No matter how tight I got the LATCH and anchor system the seat slides all around. Protecting my child trumps protecting my kid every single time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for car seats
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go over the leather seats in my new SUV. Three of use tried putting the car seats in and they just slid all over the place. I made an appointment with the police department to assist, and the officer who put them in said that the pads are too slippery for car seats, so the car seat slides around. We ended up putting rubber liners that are used to line shelves under the seat cover and over the seat cover in order to ensure the car seat stays in place. These are great for keeping a car clean, but they need better gripping capacity for car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Zazu22

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like these car seat covers very much. I got them so that I could prevent the dents from car seats. They are very substantial and extremely easy to put on. I was concerned that the bottom of the cover would hide the seat belt latch but there was a small indention that allowed the seat cover to fit nicely around the latch. They look very nice in my new car too! They arrived well packaged and delivery was as promised. I am very pleased with this purchase. I gave these a 5 star in durability because they appear to be very sturdy for their purpose. Would update if I found out differently.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great first impression
customer_reviews.text: This is my initial impression.... Pulled this cover out of the box and was impressed at how substantial it is. This is not just a piece of cloth you put over your seat. It's "padded" and feels rugged. It's easy to put the top strap over the headrest and then tuck the little flap between the seat and the back to help with "slipping". It fits the back seat of our mid-size sedan perfectly. Seems like good quality to me and my first impression is good!
customer_reviews.author: JMT Cairn

customer_reviews.title: A well made heavy duty seat protector
customer_reviews.text: I needed a protector for the seats in my 2017 fiat spider. Every time I would get in I would rub the leather seat which is now starting to leave a scuff in the leather. Regular seat covers wouldn’t fit and there is very little room to work behind the seat for straps. This cover went on easy and covers the spot where I rub. It seems well made and durable. It was a little stiff at first but after a couple of miles it has formed to the seat and I forget it’s even there. Time will tell how it will hold up in the Florida sun since I never put the top up.
customer_reviews.author: Rackon

customer_reviews.title: Effective for protecting leather seats and very attractive looking with black leather interior.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 2014 Ram 1500 Laramie with black leather interior. I wanted something to protect the seats from our car seat and this seems to distribute the weight very well. The black color matches my interior very well and that was important to me. It almost looks like something that would have come in with the truck. Now, I ordered the car seat version that was supposed to have a storage pocket on the front and it looks like they sent the "for sitting comfort" style. Honestly I think I like this better. With the car seat on this I think that mesh pocket would be fairly useless plus my truck has ample storage.
customer_reviews.author: Carl G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable padding for my old SUV!
customer_reviews.text: My car is 16 years old, and my driver's seat is starting to have holes work in it, thus some of the springs have been poking me. I know most people are probably using this seat protector for seats in the back of the car, but I wanted to use it for myself. It is quite large (I have an SUV), really high quality construction, and super comfortable. I love the pockets below it. I'm going to use those to keep spare change and random little things. I also have the back seat organizer from Lusso and it's well made and awesome also! I may buy a matching one for the front passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Broddrick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Covers the whole seat.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They are wide and cover the seat. Easy to install and adjust. Fold up nicely when you need to move them around. I’m not worried about my née seats being ruined by kids car seats. Wish I had bought these years ago!! Side note- The storage pockets seem a bit of a waste. Maybe for younger kids it would be beneficial like maybe for wipes or pacifiers or something like that, but for older kids who have legs hanging over the seat....not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McGinniss

customer_reviews.title: Quality and money well spent!! Cool finally.
customer_reviews.text: After researching for days on amazon, I bought this for my leather, heat-holding, driver seat and it works great!!! No slippage. And it's not complicated-covers what's necessary. Cleans up nicely and keeps the booty cool in killer temps. You can hop right in without worry. I wish there was a strap for the front but that's just me. The air freshener it came with made my car smell GLORIOUS for two weeks....why isn't THAT for sale?? Highly recommend the seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: beautyandbrains

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was super easy and the coverage on the seat (Chevrolet Suburban) was perfect! It also fit perfectly with extra room on each side for our Britax front-face car seat. The material is excellent quality and the padding is in all the right areas. So happy with my purchase and even happier that my leather seats in my car will not be ruined. Extra bonus is that any snack crumbs get caught on the protector and quickly vacuum or wipe off rather than getting rubbed into the seats. No nasty messes when you go to move the car seat! 🙌🏼 I would highly recommend this product to any parent searching for a seat protector.
customer_reviews.author: mbanks

customer_reviews.title: Decent value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought to protect my seats in front on my 2012 Equinox. I have a friction tear on my driver seat by the outer rolled seam. I bought this thinking XL would be adequate but it isn't. After I see it advertised as 18.5 inches I measured it on my car and it measured 17 inches. Because of the concave of my seat it scrunched up to 17 inches. Therefore, I need a base 24 inches to cover my seat completely. Otherwise very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: there's a reason why this seat protector has such a ridiculously high amazon rating (92% 5-star), it's because it absolutely rocks, worth twice the price imo... i actually purchased it for my expensive dxracer gaming chair in an effort to curb the incessant "plather" flaking that started recently, just 2 years after purchase, not only does the seat cover fit perfectly but the color scheme also matches perfectly! i just wish i knew in advance that the dxracer chair fabric/plather flaked so badly, after such a relatively short time, if i had known this i would have purchased this seat cover when i purchased the chair!
customer_reviews.author: roberto

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and thickness and it breath and appears sturdy. Minor slipping problem.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to protect my seats from my work suspenders. I do like it except some sliding around of the bottom. Not a lot, but I have to tug it over a little when I get in. I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SD Abingdon, MD

customer_reviews.title: 2 Years Later - Still Look New
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned out my car yesterday and decided to take out and wipe down these seat covers since they were covered in sand from the beach. We've been using them for over two years and they still look brand new. No rips, no tears, excellent condition. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hays

customer_reviews.title: Definitely protects the seat
customer_reviews.text: We put this in my husbands car to protect his seats before we had our baby. We didn't put one in my car since it was old and I didn't think a car seat could really do that much harm. Boy was I wrong. When I recently took the base out of my car the seat had visible marks on it that didn't seem to go away. When we looked at my husband's there were 2 small marks towards the bottom of the seat and that was all. This definitely protected the leather from damage. We just bought a second one to put in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It is stiff and mostly inflexible which makes it really uncomfortable. It doesn't even offer full seat coverage which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Shavlik

customer_reviews.title: Grip Dots Leave Permanent Impressions
customer_reviews.text: It’s a solid and sturdy car seat protector. But the dots that grip grip so well that the left permanent dips on my leather seats. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amchuu

customer_reviews.title: A must have for leather seats
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Lusso gear seat protectors for our new van with leather seats. I worried that the car seats would leave permanent impressions on the leather. I was rather impressed with the seat protectors. They have excellent padding that blocks the hard bottoms of the carseat. The carseats still go in tight and snug. I also like the little pockets on the front for snacks for the kids. All in all I would recommend these to anyone with car seats as they will save your seat from any damage.
customer_reviews.author: ali trincado

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but you're only getting ONE.
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that it was just one seat cover I was getting. While the quality does seem good, I was shocked and sad that only one arrived. The description and title of this product lacks any details describing that you're buying just a singular panel. If I would have known this, I would have never purchased! Okay sure, the picture is of one but I figured at the time it was just as view of the product not the quantity. $60 is expensive in comparison to others for half the price. The covers I previously purchased elsewhere for my leather seats are working perfectly to protect them from 2 car seats at half the price. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: JLynn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality seat saver!
customer_reviews.text: My children's car seats were really starting to wear on my seats, leaving indentations and collecting lots of yucky junk! This has been a lifesaver for my seats. The padding is great, it fits my seats wonderfully (Ford Escape), it's easy to install, and I love that there are a couple of pockets to store their trinkets in. This seat protector is made with care and quality, and has stayed in place perfectly. We have a Chicco NextFit and a Graco Nautlis car seats and this works well for both seats! I would definitely recommend this for anyone looking for a quality product to save their seats!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Better than most other so called “seat protectors”
customer_reviews.text: Better than most car seat, seat covers. The thicker padding ensures that your heavy car seat (and added weight of the kiddo in the car seat) won’t leave horrible seat impressions on expensive leather seats. Have had inferior seat protectors with less padding before, and my seats had horrible damage from the weight/impression left once the car seat and cover was removed. Never again. This seat cover is an easy recommend and does just what it’s supposed to do, to protect those expensive leather seats in your fancy baby transporting vessel. Mine is a Tesla Model X. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dickie Greenleaf

customer_reviews.title: saving my seat covers one day a time!
customer_reviews.text: I have leather seats and of course have seen the damage that car seats can do to those seats overtime. When I was reviewing different brands and features, this one popped up as a good choice. It was so easy to install and seems more durable than the others I've reviewed. Car seat is in and ready to go! I also like the fact that it has a little net for storage on the bottom! It can hold wipes, diapers, toys, etc.
customer_reviews.author: StormCrow

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t slip or make car seat loose.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Red stitching matches interior of VW GTI perfectly and fits seat perfectly. I have a Chicco Nextfit car seat and it is one of the larger models available and it fit on the cover well. I use the latch system to install car seat on top of the cover and had zero movement or slipping. I always sit in the car seat as I tighten it to get it very secure. No marks in leather after first removal, no signs of wear on cover either.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Dirty
customer_reviews.text: Look, this appears to be a great car seat protector. Reviews are fantastic and I spent a considerable amount of time trying to find the best product for my leather seats. These, in my opinion, are the best. That said, the one I received was dirty. Foreign hair, dirt, glitter. Pretty disgusting. Needless to say it’s going back and I’m going to reconsider my research.
customer_reviews.author: Bethanyerin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very practical
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to install. The only reason why I gave this item four star is upon opening the package and examining the seat cover I notice in the back to appear as hair on the product as if it was used. I didn’t really sweat it, I just sanitized it and I installed it. I check to see if it was something from the material that was shedding onto the backside and their wasn’t anything that rubbed off like hair. Pictures attached.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have a convertible with white leather interior for my daily driver. I also work construction. These seat covers are perfect for what I need. They are durable, stay in place (unlike a towel that slides and falls down all the time) and protect my seats from dirt and cuts. Then when the weekend comes, and I want to put the top down and show off my white seats, they come off in seconds! (unlike conventional seat covers) The front pouch isn't something I use, but I'm sure people do, and while I don't have side impact air-bags, these would be great seat covers that wouln't interfere.
customer_reviews.author: Shantastic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Seat Protection!
customer_reviews.text: I’m already loving this seat mat! The bottom has enough cushion to prevent impressions from our car seat, which is one of the top reasons I wanted a cover. Additionally, the material is easy to clean, and helps catch little crumbs that would have ended up on the seat. I really love the fact that it doesn’t interfere with my ability to fold my seats. I don’t have to remove/replace it if I need to fold my seats up. Very happy customer! This is a 2017-2019 Explorer, bucket seats.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: installs easily, seems durable. Has a slightly odd smell , like they hit it with a laundry detergent scent on purpose. Not too bad, but you do notice it at first. Overall for the price, very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Banana recommends

customer_reviews.title: WHY do you include an awful smelling air freshener?!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't installed this car seat protector because it absolutely reeks of an air freshener they included in the shipment. The seat cover has been airing out in the garage for over 3 days and is now acting as a giant air freshener in there and the scent will not go away! I was really hoping to put this in my car to protect the leather seats from our infant car seat, but I can't put this near my newborn, plus my brand new car will reek of this awful headache inducing smell. Really wish it came without the scented gift, because otherwise this seems like a great quality product, but I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Best protector available! Liked it so well I ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat protector when I finally broke down and bought a mini van. I wanted to protect the leather seats from the convertible car seat child number 3 rides in. I like the pockets for tucking In random items and I like that it is wide enough and thick enough to provide true protection. My seats do not have imprints from the car seat. I liked this so well I bought a second one to go under the booster seat for child number 2. Her feet were getting the regular car seat all dirty and scratched as she climbed into her booster. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Working mom

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying again!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Lusso Gear Car Seat Protector I have purchased. It's a very good quality product. I needed to remove the Protector to move my granddaughter's carseat (in order to make room for another one) and no marks or dents were left on the back seat even where the tightly affixed carseat had sat on it. I now have another Lusso Gear Car Seat Protector for my new grandchild's carseat!
customer_reviews.author: Wendie15

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for protection of seat, but it’s tearing
customer_reviews.text: We have had on the leather seats in our new car for about 7 months. I think they have done really well protecting the seat bottoms from the compression of the car seat. There’s not as much padding on the backs, so the seat backs show a little compression/indentation. Could just be that the car seat hits in between the padding a bit too. All in all, I would recommend for protecting your car’s seats. My only real issue is that the stitching has come apart completely on one of them. Maybe it’s from our little ones foot kicking at it, but I would expect a bit more durability in under a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle P.

customer_reviews.title: Just took carseat out after a year using the mat- Can't even tell a carseat was there!
customer_reviews.text: I had just bought a new car with white leather seats. I take my 4 yr old niece to dance every week. I had to keep a big bulky carseat in my car at all times. I was so afraid my seats would get ruined. I've heard horror stories of what those seats can do. Thank goodness I found this! I just took her seat out because by the time I see her again she'll be too big for this. There is absolutely no visible evidence a child's carseat was even used in my car. Oh and during that time of having it we spilled a little chocolate milk and it protected my seat. whew! So happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Donnice macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2020 Outback Onyx
customer_reviews.text: I had some reservations about this protector but glad that I got it! It fit perfectly in my 2020 Outback and with my infant car seat. I was worried maybe it would be too narrow for the carseat but had a few inches overlap on either side. Didn’t even realize that I ordered the same brand of carseat mirror, which I am also happy with. Overall, great purchase and super easy to install. Will be getting another for our other car.
customer_reviews.author: 1uvakine

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: After searching through the choices and reading reviews I decided to order two of these for my carseats. I was not disappointed in the workmanship that has gone into these protectors. I have not had them long enough to evaluate if the amount of protection between the carseat and the actual seat will prevent those pressure indents in the seats; however, judging from the thickness of the covers I will assume those will not happen. I would highly recommend these for anyone looking to preserve their seats from everyday stains as well as long term car seat damage. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Skittles

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been very picky took a long time to look for the car accessories. I did not want to buy something like graco that screams for baby brand. I finally found My favorite company. I previously purchased their kick mat and loved it so I decided to try this car seat protector. It’s very easy to install and their quality is amazing like other reviewers mentioned!! I love it most of all it looks expensive! I highly recommend it’s worth your money and great customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: hohoho

customer_reviews.title: You can tell this is of high quality - and it works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I have many Lusso products in both of my cars. I have the seat back protectors and these seat protectors. These seat protectors are very good. The cushion is firm, not some cheap foam that eventually sags over time. The materials are very durable and easy to maintain. My daughter and I like to go hunt for muddy puddles, so one of my cars gets very muddy. My daughter likes to rest the heels of her feet on the little edge of the seat that the car seat doesn't cover. Fortunately, the Lusso seat protector does cover that edge - and it gets MUDDY. Cleans so easily. This product gets 5 stars all the way across.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but starts to fall apart after a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 8 months ago, but I was disappointed with the stitching on it. When I saw other reviews, I was surprised that so many others had the same issues. My daughter just turned 2 and rarely wears her shoes in the car. But, it totally stared to fall apart in multiple spots. It does a good job of protecting our seats from damage but for the price, it should should hold together longer than 8 months. Now we’re expecting another baby in October and we are shopping for 2 new covers. I’ll reach out to the manufacturer, I’ve read that they are good about replacing the defected products.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Saved the leather in our new car
customer_reviews.text: Saves the leather in our new car. Fits great and very thick. I particularly like the grippy bottom side so it doesn't slide around on the seat. Has done a great job at keeping our kids feet and car seat off the leather of the seat. Also because the padding is so thick, it prevents the carseat from digging into the leather and keep it from scratching the surface or getting things dirty. It also has a strap and buckle around the back top so that it will hold onto the headrest bars. The strap is a bit cheaper feeling than the rest, but otherwise it all works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: New Car and new booster seat, so I decided to also purchase a new seat protector. From the packaging to the product itself, I could tell this was a "level up"-true to the name...luxury. As described - thick, full length, well constructed seat protector. Extremely easy to install. As it is new and a recent installation, I can't speak to it's durability but I'm anticipating this is a product above my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Nicks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and looks great in a 2018 Tesla Model 3
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to protect my seats from the weight of my daughters car seat. The material that they are made of is high quality and the fitment was perfect in my Model 3. Only time will tell on how well they will do protecting my seats, but currently very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kris R.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Straps to Fit Around Seats
customer_reviews.text: I had to figure out how to get the straps around my seat, but once I did, it was smooth sailing because they are adjustable. However, the padding isn't that thick, and I wish the creased portion covered the entire back portion of my seat, incase of spills.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: We have an Acura MDX and needed two of these emissary covers to help protect the seats from our small children. The seat covers are extremely simple to install and are very low-profile. And one of the Lusso team members even sent me an additional part to help me connect the seat cover to our middle seat more effectively. I didn’t even ask! Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Darrow

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to cover leather seats following gym. Fast on and off
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy well-made, firm, seat cover that is easy to get on and off for the occasional use. It is not comfortable in the least, but I only use it when sweaty so I don't salt my seats from the constant dripping of perspiration. It is really a 5-star cushion for me, but I deducted a star for people looking for a full-time cover, I think this would be a little harsh!
customer_reviews.author: D'harans

customer_reviews.title: BEST Car Seat Protection
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these in my truck to protect the leather seats from my kids car seats. As far as protection goes, these things are GREAT! Not once have I ever taken the car seats out after being strapped down tight and had any indentations in the leather. My reason for giving it 4 stairs instead of 5 is because they don’t stick or stay on the seats unless they are held down by a car seat. They slide all over the place and it’s kind of annoying. Other then that, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.  Seat is wider than a similar version which covers buckle latch.  Tougher for booster seats, good for bucket
customer_reviews.text: Excellent protector and a must have with kids. I have these as well as a set of Royal Oxford protectors. They are almost identical in materials, look, and construction however these a little wider on the seat. That may be good for some and not good for others. These are a little more difficult to use on the booster type seats that need to be seatbelted in everytime. The wider seat covers up the buckle latch and it can be tough to find at times. If it's for a clipped in bucket seat that doesn't use the seatbelt these are fine and probably better.
customer_reviews.author: Tim ATop Contributor: Ukuleles

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy because it is a 2 pack. I had bought 1 before for almost the same amount as this 2 pack. My 2 other cars needed these so i give it a gamble and bought these. I am impressed! Great value and quality pads to protect the leather seats from the grooves that baby seats imprint. I will recommend these to friends and family in the future when adding a baby seat to cars with leather.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing I suppose
customer_reviews.text: Using it on an Escalade, the size fits well, it stays secure, and matches the black leather well. My main issue is that the car seat still leaves marks on the leather although I'm sure not as bad as it would be without it. The covers bottom surface also imprints on the leather. Wouldn't recommend or buy again for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Xtian

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought two of these, one for each car, and are so happy we did. My husband is a bit of a neat freak about our cars, and despite his extreme pickiness, he is pleased with the purchase. The customer service was wonderful, even contacting us before we received the seat protectors to ensure us that they support their projects. We will likely purchase these for our sons' cars as a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Decent Cover
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a new car and with two car seats in the back I wanted to protect my leather (a mistake I made the first time around). The seat cover is durable and easy to install I just wish there was more cover on the sides as my kids can get a little wild with their pouches and after our first trip I found yogurt on the side of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Noah M. Glassman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my leather seat from my daughter's carseat and it works perfectly; it's thick, great quality and adjustable to work with any seat. It's easy to clean and install and features pockets at the front that make it convenient to use. I definitely suggest it to anyone looking to extend the life of their leather when using a carseat.
customer_reviews.author: Cat B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product even better company
customer_reviews.text: I bought these protectors because I have three grandchildren that I buying a new vehicle for and using for their car seats. I spoke with Brandon Leslie and and the rest of the crew from lusso and explain to them that I had an issue concerning a color problem matching second vehicle I was purchasing. They were fantastic to deal with I've never had such a great experience dealing with any company as well as people who work for a company. I highly recommend anyone who's looking for any products that lusso provides to look there first.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Love the cleanable materials and the non slip bottom. Since i have leather seats already, i was a bit concerned on how it would stay in place. Wish the gaps on either side were closed with slots rather than only the slots though. Feels like a lot of debris could still get through, but he's still too little to know for sure. Plan on buying 3 more for my husband's car and my parents'.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Luke

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I normally won’t trash a product, but this I literally did trash it. What a piece of junk. I'm amazed they have 5 stars; it should be -5 stars. Within a week it was falling apart. The straps at the top broke off after a few days. it slides all over the place. I tossed it in the trash where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Saves your seat
customer_reviews.text: This thing is like gold! It's super thick and my seats don't have a dent now from my 4 year olds car seat! The back has grips so it stays in place. I have a Jeep Cherokee and it fits perfectly on the seat, it also has openings for the click connect system and doesn't over hang onto the middle seat. I will be buying another one for my sons carseat!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily at the seat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product back in January I installed it exactly like it said which is very easy to do I have no complaints there but I do have a complaint about is that it’s already torn from every day use which it’s in your car every day so it’s used every day. I don’t see an option here to write the company to ask for another one in return because I do feel that I haven’t even had it a year. so be careful when you buy this product mine seem to tear at the seat very easily after a few months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for leather seats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my leather seats and it does a great job. This is very easy to install and you can tell they put a lot of thought into this as there is plenty of room to route the seat tie downs to without having to shift the base around and the padding is in the right spots. Highly recommend for leather seats.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: They fit in my Honda CRV perfectly. I got one for each car seat and am very happy with them as they cover the seats well and the car seats still fit very securely. They don’t have a crazy pattern on the bottom that would ruin leather seats like some other brands. The pockets are great for keeping snacks, toys, wipes etc handy for the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Demby

customer_reviews.title: If you take pride in your vehicle...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Lusso car seat protectors for my wife’s new car and was thoroughly impressed. They are made of great quality, easy to maneuver, and easy to install. Loved them so much, turned around and bought another set for my truck. This product is a must if you want to protect your vehicle’s seats from children. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: foote410

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected! Will be replacing our others with these soon!
customer_reviews.text: These are really quality seat protectors! We added a carseat to the numbers, so we needed another seat protector. This one is so nice, I am going to replace the other ones we have as soon as I can. I think these will save the seats from getting the carseat imprints into the leather. We have a brand new car and my husband won't leave the seats in between picking up grandkids. Maybe he will now. Seriously, these were only maybe $10 more than the other ones we bought....really worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Elli

customer_reviews.title: Keep the new car in new shape :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new car, and after removing the car seat and seeing the EXTREME indents that did not pop back up, I was hesitant to put it in the shiny new car. This seems to have thick paddle that will disperse the pressure and keep the seat in good shape. Updates to come, but my initial impression is that this product is doing an amazing job.
customer_reviews.author: LindsvanleerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Covers a large seat and is durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked it very much. I have a 2007 Mercury Grand Marquis and it covered the seat over to where the seat belt coupler is. It is thick. I wear a pistol belt at work and the holster was wearing and tearing the car seat. Now it rests against this thick rugged seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: charles underhile

customer_reviews.title: Covers the back of the seat
customer_reviews.text: We had the shorter seat covers before that only protect the seat from the car seat. With an infant/toddler turned backward the back of the seat takes serious abuse (milk, food, shoes, etc.). Having something to protect the seat saves wear and tear on your car and makes it much easier to clean; instead of scrubbing your seat, just throw this cover in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased a new Highlander and wanted to make sure our seats are protected as this is hopefully going to be our last vehicle purchase for a long time. This seat cover has really thick padding and provide full coverage for the entire seat. I have no doubt that it will prevent the seat from indentations and debris. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car seat protector
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a car with leather seats and wanted a protector from my grandson's car seat. I like where the padding is in the protector. This fits wonderfully well and isn't showing any wear. His seat still faces toward the back which means his little feet move a lot. I recommend this seat protector.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Placed Under Car Seats - Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these - they both fit great in our Chevy Traverse and accommodate both our forward-facing and rear-facing car seats. They are still holding up really well! The headrest elastic straps have kept these seat protectors in place without stretching out. The organizer flaps at the bottom are a neat bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sytsma

customer_reviews.title: Stinks. Literally.
customer_reviews.text: Seat cover comes with "free air freshener" in the box, and that smell permeates the seat cover. The cover reeks like the deodorizers used in public bathrooms. My guess is that the seller ended up with a bunch unsellable air fresheners (because this scent is awful) and thought it would be a good idea to surprise everyone with this stench. Surprising, yes, but not in a good way. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for your car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice seat protector, it's thick enough so the child seat does not cut into the leather seat. The gray protector matches our Subaru Forester gray leather seats.
customer_reviews.author: A. Garcia Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Fits-Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: Used this /seat cover in my New 2018 GMC Acadia Denali. Fits nice & looks nice, not cheap! I wanted it to protect my new car-2nd row driver side captain chair from dogs jumping up onto it to get into their car seat which sits on the passenger side captains chair. It does slide somewhat when they jump onto it but it protects more than it slides so it will do the job. The backside on cover is suppose to be anti-slip that won't affect the leather seats.....time will tell but I don't think that will be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Suzbeau

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on seat - slips
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, feels sturdy, but slips and slides every time you get in or out.
customer_reviews.author: dinotaco

product_meta.title: Lusso Gear Car Seat Protector with Thickest Padding - Featuring XL Size (Best Coverage Available), Durable, Waterproof 600D Fabric, PVC Leather Reinforced Corners & 2 Large Pockets for Handy Storage
product_meta.description: Color:Red| Size:For Child Car SeatFinally, The Most Reliable & Modern Car Seat Protector Has Just Been Released! Wait No More! Tired of nasty food spillage all over the car seats? Looking for a seat cover that will provide you endless comfort? Traveling along with pets, kids or babies? If so, then this car seat cover is here for you. Protect your car’s upholstery, improve its looks and make everyone wonder. No more messy covers, no more scratches ruining aesthetics, no more beverage stains. We’ve got you seats covered, with these protectors! Maintain & Safeguard The Insides Of Your Vehicle With Lusso Gear Car Seat Protectors! Toss away all those cheaply made seat covers and invest in this well-designed seat cover collection. Combining reinforced stitching, comfortable padding and hassle free maintenance, our car seat protectors are here to accommodate even your most demanding needs. No matter if your car’s upholstery is brand new, second hand or just old, our seat protectors will compliment it anyway. Enjoy maximum style, irresistible comfort and durable seat covers today! Your car deserves the best. Here’s Why This Car Seat Protector Is The Last One You Will Ever Need: - Premium quality car seat covers. Durable PVC leather construction. - Conforms and adjusts to your needs via its safety straps. - 3 pockets for organizing your travel gear and accessories! - Slip resistant dot coating for extra grip. Enjoy a snug fit. - For small and large cars, minivans, jeeps, bus seats, trucks, and your car of course! - Hassle free cleaning. Wipe it clean to remove dirt build-up, pet hair, dust, or stains What are you waiting for? Get yours today, while supplies last!
feature_bullets: EXTEND YOUR CARS UPHOLSTERY LIFE: If you are looking for a stylish yet highly resilient car seat protector, then you should end your search here. We have the greatest car seat cover that will protect your cars upholstery, extend the life of your vehicle and make it look like brand new! Avoid excessive wear and tear, minimize pet scratches or drooling, without having to spend a small fortune.

WONT SLIDE OR SLIP: Designed with your best interest at heart, this car seat cover has adjustable safety straps that will tie the cover securely to the headrest. Securely fasten them to achieve a perfect fit. Forget about seat protectors sliding off the seat, slipping under your legs and causing discomfort. This car seat cover has anti slip dots for extra grip. Perfect for those traveling with kids, their whole family, babies, or solo!

WHEN DURABILITY MEETS STYLE: Made from high quality PVC leather, our car seat cover is here to add style and comfort while driving your car. Prevent damage from beverages or food spills thanks to its water-resistant nature. Improve the look of your car on the spot with these unisex black covers. Slip them over in seconds and enjoy! Their extra padded construction, ensures comfy commuting to work or traveling out of town.

ITS ALL ABOUT ERGONOMICS: Save your precious time and energy and keep the absolute essentials close by, in its 3 built-in pockets. Reap all the benefits of having a large organizing space beneath your feet and facilitate your trips to the fullest. Place inside anything that comes to mind. From childrens toys, snacks, water bottles, books, a tiny first aid kit, your phone, sunglasses case, lunch boxes, tissues, and so many more.

GET THIS COOL CAR SEAT COVER RISK FREE: Since your satisfaction is our top priority, this car seat cover is backed by our unconditional 1 year money back guarantee policy! Just in case you dont simply love this seat protector. Makes a thoughtful gift to a dear friend or beloved family member. Preserve the upholstery of your new or even a little bit old vehicle in mint condition. A must have accessory for all car owners.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars998 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
